item.description:
Hope to see you guys there next friday!, for another mixer.





Venue: 7 one 1, is one bolyeston streets hottest bar/lounges. This place has 2 bars, 1 dance floor, 1 giant fish tank, and a whole lot of fun. It nice hidden gem on bolyeston street, and its the perfect size place for this meetup, not too big and not too small.

Venue transport: green line to copley square
Venue parking: always on newbury street
Venue fee: 10 dollars for members of this group and their friends for entry to 7 one 1, remember to rsvp so you can be on the guest list.
item.how_to_find_us: This meetup will take place near the sushi bar area of 7 one 1. When you walk down the stairs it is the bar to your left. Its obviously the smaller bar of the 2 bars that are in 7 one 1. Also there is a huge fish tank right near the bar.
item.why: to meet new people have a good time
item.name: MEETUP MIXER
